Title: crosshyb
Description: Character vector of Illumina probes whose probe sequence promiscuously aligns to non-target sections of the genome matching 47bp or higher.

Title: snpsall
Description: Data.frame of EPICv1 and 450k Illumina probes whose target CpG lies on or near a known SNP. SNP ID, distance to CpG and minor allele frequency are all reported here.

Title: XY.probes
Description: Character vector of Illumina probes whose target CpG site is on a sex chromosome.

Title: hg19.generanges
Description: GRanges object giving the genomic intervals of all gene regions in the Ensembl Release 75 of hg19.

Title: hg38.generanges
Description: GRanges object giving the genomic intervals of all gene regions in the Ensembl Release 102 of hg38.

Title: mm10.generanges
Description: GRanges object giving the genomic intervals of all gene regions in the Ensembl Release 102 of mm10.

Title: epicv2snps
Description: Data.frame of EPICv2 Illumina probes whose target CpG lies on or near a known SNP. SNP ID, distance to CpG and minor allele frequency are all reported here.

Title: ALLbetas
Description: Matrix of EPICv2 beta values from Noguera-Castells et al. (2023) consisting of five B cell acute lymphoblastic leukaemia (BALL) and five T cell acute lymphoblastic leukaemia (TALL) samples for DMR calling.
